alert.note: Alert for Southeastern Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 3:04PM AKST until January 10 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Strong winds with blowing snow, low visibility and cold wind chills occuring. Plan on difficult travel conditions. North winds gusting to 45 mph. Wind chills to 50 below. Visibility will be one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Near Brooks Range Passes. * WHEN...Now through 3 AM Monday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chills as low as 50 below zero will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means periods of blowing snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
